relations.evidence: security scares spark browser fix microsoft is working on a new version of its internet explorer web browser.
the announcement about internet explorer was made by bill gates  microsoft chairman and chief software architect
the announcement about internet explorer was made by bill gates  microsoft chairman and chief software architect
test versions of the new program  called ie 7  are due to be released by the summer.
a new version of ie was widely expected to debut with the next version of windows  codenamed longhorn  which is due to appear in 2006.
there are also persistent rumours that search engine google is poised to produce its own brand browser based on firefox
